item.title: Choose Your Trunk, Choose Your Handoff
item.description:
By: John Shepler Although the telephone system has evolved for the better with advancements like wireless smartphones and VoIP, many companies hesitate to abandon their existing infrastructure. Fortunately, “handoffs” bridge the gap between old and new phone systems. A handoff is essentially a point of connection between telecom lines and equipment. The traditional analog POTS (Plain Old Telephone Service) line, using a single twisted pair of copper wires, remains a simple solution for businesses needing a single line...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/choose-your-trunk-choose-your-handoff/
